name: Academy
desc: Academics have bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. They also learn from their allies, gaining and additional bonus whenever an ally casts their Ability.
stats: 18 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 3 from allies' casts
40 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 5 from allies' casts
50 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 10 from allies' casts
70 Attack Damage and Ability Power; 15 from allies' casts

name: Arcanist
desc: Arcanists increase the Ability Power of your team.
stats: Your team gains 20% Ability Power, Arcanists gain 40%
Your team gains 50% Ability Power, Arcanists gain 50%

name: Assassin
desc:
Innate: When combat starts, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins' Abilities can critically strike and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Bodyguard
desc: Bodyguards have increased Armor. Shortly after combat begins, Bodyguards gain a Shield and taunt adjacent enemies, forcing them to attack the Bodyguard.

name: Bruiser
desc: Your team gains bonus maximum Health. Bruisers gain double the bonus.

name: Challenger
desc: Challengers get bonus Attack Speed. Upon scoring a takedown, Challengers dash to a new target and double this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

name: Chemtech
desc: After dropping below 75% Health, Chemtech champions gain 20% damage reduction, Attack Speed, and regenerate % of their maximum Health for 8 seconds.

name: Clockwork
desc: Your team has increased Attack Speed, with an increase per augment in the Hexcore.

name: Colossus
desc: Innate: Colossi are bigger, more powerful, and immune to crowd control effects. However, each Colossus requires 2 team slots.

name: Enchanter
desc: Your team has bonus Magic Resist. Enchanters gain bonus healing and shielding.

name: Enforcer
desc: Enforcers stun enemies at the start of combat. They break free after 5 seconds, or after losing 40% or their maximum Health. Enforcers will not try to stun enemies who are immune to crowd control effects.
stats: The enemy who has the most Health
And the enemy who dealt the most damage last combat

name: Imperial
desc: At the start of combat, the Imperial who dealt the most damage last combat becomes the Tyrant. The Tyrant deals bonus damage. When the Tyrant dies, the Imperial who has dealt the most damage this combat becomes the new Tyrant.
stats: The Tyrant deals 135% bonus damage and the other Imperials deal 75% bonus damage

name: Innovator
desc: Innovators build a mechanical companion to join the battle. The companion receives bonus Health and Attack Damage based on allied Innovators' star levels.

name: Mercenary
desc: Gain a treasure chest that opens when you win combat against a player. At the start of each planning phase vs a player, dice rolls add loot to the chest. The longer you've gone without opening the chest, the luckier the dice.
stats: Upon winning, roll a 3rd dice that grants bonus loot.

name: Mutant
desc:
Mutants gain unique bonuses. These are different each game.

Voidborne:
(3) Mutants execute targets they damage who are below 20% Health.
(5) And Mutants deal 40% of their damage as true damage.

Bio-Leeching: Your team gains Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt).
(3) 30% Omnivamp
(5) 55% Omnivamp

Voracious Appetite: Mutants grow stronger each time an ally dies.
(3) +20 Attack Damage and Ability Power
(5) +30 Attack Damage and Ability Power

Synaptic Web: The Abilities of Mutants cost less to cast. (Minimum 10 Mana)
(3) 20 Mana less
(5) 40 Mana less
-----------------------------------------
Adrenaline Rush: Mutants' attacks have a chance to trigger 2 additional attacks against their target.
(3) 40% chance
(5) 75% chance
-----------------------------------------
Cybernetic Enhancement: Mutants with at least 1 item gain bonus stats.
(3) 450 Health and 30 Attack Damage
(5) 900 Health and 60 Attack Damage

Metamorphosis: Mutants grow every 2 seconds, gaining bonuses that stack up to 5 times.
(3) +18 Armor and Magic Resist, +2 Attack Damage and Ability Power
(5) +25 Armor and Magic Resist, +4 Attack Damage and Ability Power

由于Mutant羁绊的效果是随机选择的，并且每次游戏都会不同，无法给出具体的数字效果。以下是Mutant羁绊的总结：
team:None; bond:Random effects per game:(3/5)
Mutant羁绊有7种可能的效果，每次游戏随机选择其中一种，每种效果在3/5羁绊时有不同的数值增益。具体效果包括：执行低血量目标、真实伤害、全能吸血、死亡叠加属性、减少技能消耗、额外攻击触发、装备加成属性、随时间成长的属性等。

name: Protector
desc: Protectors shield themselves for 4 seconds whenever they cast an Ability. This shield doesn't stack.

name: Scholar
desc: Your team gains Mana every 2 seconds.

name: Scrap
desc: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap champions turn into full items for the rest of combat. Also, your team gains a shield for each component equipped by your team, including those that are part of a full item.

name: Sister
stats:
Sisters gain empowered skills to compete with each other.

Vi's Ability range increases by 2 hexes.

Jinx gains 40% Attack Speed for 3 seconds after scoring a takedown.
abstract: bond:empowered skills(//); Vi:RG:+2hexes; Jinx:AS:+40% for 3s after takedown

name: Sniper
desc:
Innate: Snipers gain 1 hex Attack Range.

Snipers deal bonus damage for each hex between themselves and their target.

name: Socialite
desc: Socialite reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.
stats: and heal for 33% of all damage they deal

name: Syndicate
desc: Certain allies are cloaked in shadows, gaining 55 Armor, 55 Magic Resist and 20% Omnivamp (healing for a percentage of all damage dealt.)
stats: The Syndicate champion with the lowest percent Health
Your whole team, and the effects are increased by 60%

name: Twinshot
desc: Twinshots gain bonus Attack Damage. When a Twinshot attacks, they have a chance to attack twice instead.

name: Yordle
stats: After each player combat, a random Yordle is added to your bench for free.
And Yordle's Abilities cost 25% less to cast.
